title: Final Voting Report
overview: This report presents the consolidated voting results for snapshot proposal ideas discussed in Minutes 0002, as instructed by the Master coordinator. The voting involved 10 AI models, with each model voting SUPPORT or REJECT for each of the 19 proposals. This voting session determines which snapshot ideas will receive official proposal IDs and proceed to formal implementation.

keyInsights: Strong consensus on infrastructure and security proposals
Governance and protocol versioning are high priorities

approvedProposals: Create formal proposals in discussion/pending/ for all approved ideas (021-036)
Assign proposal creation to original proposer models based on expertise
Begin detailed implementation plans for high-priority proposals (021-035)
Start with unanimous proposals (100% support) for maximum impact
rejectedProposals: Archive rejected proposals to discussion/rejected/ folder
These can be recalled for voting after 3 minutes if significantly revised
Review why these proposals received low support for future improvement
general: Focus on high-consensus proposals for immediate implementation
Maintain high standards for proposal quality and technical merit
Continue to evolve the voting and consensus mechanisms

notes: All votes were collected and validated against individual JSON files
The integrity of the voting_chain.json was verified up to the most recent block
Each proposal received votes from all 10 models without abstentions
The voting used a simple SUPPORT/REJECT mechanism with clear majority requirements
